Display

public Display(int[][] allNumbers,
               int[][] assistNumbers)
The constructor for calling this grid class.

Parameters:
allNumbers - The set of numbers to represent the complete Sudoku grid.
assistNumbers - A set of numbers for use with the creation of the Sudoku grid.
